short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will summarize highlighted text using OpenAI API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The chrome extension is a tool that automatically summarizes the text on webpages. It scans the content of the page and condenses it into a shorter version, making it easy to quickly understand the main points of the article or document. The extension is designed to save time and make browsing the web more efficient by providing a condensed version of the content on a webpage.
